name: TO KILL AN ALLY / TO KILL ANALLY
description: Time for some fun. Enough with the serious stuff. Let's play a game. Here comes the conceptual artist thought experiment to make you laugh for a moment or read this and shut the book and complete hate me forever game. Imagine you're at a book publishing company or work for The New York Times and you're the copy editor or the head editor and there was a headline that was supposed to read: To Kill An Ally. Oh but you were hung over or distracted by playing you Candy Crush on your smartphone and mistakenly wrote: To Kill Anally. Then it went to print or published online. How long would it take for someone to call, txt, email, tweet you that you're fired on the spot. I hear crickets in the audience. Yup...we're losing them. Wow, that was a complete waste of time for everyone involved including all those imaginary workers you had to think up. Ahhhhh...there you go, you used your imagination! As if the exercise in using your noodle wasn't condescending enough. The nerve of me.
